name: At your pace - Nonbinary Game Jam
name_original: At your pace - Nonbinary Game Jam
description:
CW: mention of   army/war, swearing

A visual novel about the reunion between two friends, and what they did become

The game is proposed for the Nonbinary Game Jam. You will probably meet many mistakes. As much as I don't think I will continue this, I will gladly accept constructive criticism. :)
